text: It's not properly tested and Turing does not support subsampling (<https://github.com/TuringLang/DynamicPPL.jl/issues/208>) but in principle it should be usable. It was updated to the newer sampling interface in <https://github.com/TuringLang/Turing.jl/pull/1502>. Unfortunately, there's no more extensive documentation than the docstrings and the codes currently, hopefully the whole documentation can benefit from the reorganization of the tutorials and the webpage.
